subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kevin Garnett almost single-handedly snapped the Phoenix Suns’ 17-game winning streak, scoring 44 points and grabbing 11 rebounds in the Timberwolves’ 121-112 victory last night in Minneapolis.
snippet: Kevin Garnett almost single-handedly snapped the Phoenix Suns’ 17-game winning streak, scoring 44 points and grabbing 11 rebounds in the Timberwolves’ 121-112 victory last night in Minneapolis.
